about.excerpt: Civil Engineer & BIM technologist integrating field experience with web tools and automation.
paragraphs: I am a Licensed Civil Engineer working at the intersection of infrastructure development and digital engineering. My work combines structural design thinking, BIM-based workflows, and precision technical documentation to deliver reliable and efficient engineering solutions.

Alongside traditional civil engineering practice, I develop digital tools and automation systems that improve coordination, workflow efficiency, and project execution. I approach engineering as an integrated system — where physical construction and digital intelligence work together to create smarter, more scalable infrastructure.

education.place: St. Thomas College of Engineering & Technology, Sivapuram, Kannur
education.description:
Completed undergraduate studies in Civil Engineering with emphasis on structural design, infrastructure systems, construction practices, and digital modeling workflows. Developed skills in engineering drawing, CAD drafting, technical documentation, and analytical problem-solving through academic projects and practical training.

Final year project involved the planning and design of an energy-efficient G+2 educational building using advanced BIM tools, including structural analysis, coordinated modeling, and performance optimization.
Focused on Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, building the foundation for engineering studies.
